content.text:
# 5th Irish Film & Television Awards

The 5th Annual Irish Film & Television Awards took place on 17 February 2008 at the Gaiety Theatre, Dublin, honouring Irish film and television released in 2007.
Film
Film
* Garage
** Becoming Jane
** Closing the Ring
** Kings
** Shrooms
